alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Crittenden, northwestern DeSoto, northeastern Tunica and south central Shelby Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Cormorant, or 11 miles west of Horn Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Memphis, Walls, Horseshoe Lake, Pinckney, Lake Cormorant, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Eudora, Whitehaven, Newport, Clack, Nesbit, Glover, Banks, Jago and Alden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
